user.description:
Enter your JetKVM address.

Before adding this integration, install the JetKVM helper API once via SSH:
wget --no-check-certificate -O /tmp/api-setup.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Poshy163/HomeAssistant-JetKVM/main/api-setup.sh && sh /tmp/api-setup.sh

For live video, provide the same password you use in the JetKVM web UI.
user.title: Set up JetKVM

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to JetKVM. Verify the IP/hostname and ensure the helper API is installed on the device.
error.invalid_auth: Password was rejected by JetKVM. Use the same password as the JetKVM web UI login.
error.unknown: Unexpected error while setting up JetKVM. Check Home Assistant logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This JetKVM device is already configured.

data.password: JetKVM password (leave blank to disable video)

init.description:
Update the password used for JetKVM video streaming.

Leave this blank to disable the camera entity.
init.title: JetKVM Options

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to JetKVM. Verify network access and try again.
error.unknown: Unexpected error while saving options. Check Home Assistant logs for details.
